original_title: 担任の先生と私の秘密のラブラブ結婚生活 松本いちか
overview: I'm Ichika, a school girl. Actually, I have a husband. The other person is my homeroom teacher. Of course it's a secret... I don't think it would be funny if I got caught! Please experience the daily life of Ichika's newlyweds!
title: My Secret Married Love Life With My Homeroom Teacher Ichika Matsumoto
